item.title: Megaupload?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“Skating On Java, post:6, topic:35871”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=51257.msg630639#msg630639 date=1166304735]

No, EVERY file i’ve downloaded {thats alot of files} has had NO keyloggers, only 1 with a virus and the dude who posted it got banned

Heard of a virus scanner?

Yes, but lets say someone uploaded a “stat editor” then it’s obviously a keylogger.
[/quote]

Yes for every file you download, scan it.
If anything seems suspicious (cant spell) get someone who really annoy’s you to test it out!! Lol[/quote]

Read full topic
